text: Yu Ying-shih (; 22 January 1930 â€“ 1 August 2021) was a Chinese-born American historian, sinologist, and academic. He was a professor at Princeton University. He was known for his writing about Chinese history and philosophy. He also worked at Harvard University and Yale University. Yu was born in Tianjin, China. Yu died on 1 August 2021 in Princeton, New Jersey at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Chinese historians Category:Chinese academics Category:American historians Category:Yale University faculty Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Princeton University faculty Category:Harvard University faculty
title: Yu Ying-shih
